stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following:  Gain 4 credits and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.  Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
text:
Resolve 1 of the following:
• Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
• Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
title: Mindscaping
